welcome_message_body: Welcome to Las Palmas, Spain! Get ready to experience the charm of this vibrant city, known for its beautiful beaches, rich history, and lively culture. Take your time to explore and enjoy all that Las Palmas has to offer.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Fuji
restaurants.description: Restaurante Fuji is a japanese restaurant located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
restaurants.address: Fernando Guanarteme 56, 35010 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Canarias

restaurants.name: La Tasca de los Vinos
restaurants.description: La Tasca de los Vinos is a spanish restaurant located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
restaurants.address: Av. José Mesa y López, 43, 35010 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Canarias

restaurants.name: 200 Gr.
restaurants.description: 200 Gr. is a burger joint located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
restaurants.address: C. Ruiz de Alda, 26 (C. Uruguay), 35007 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Canarias

restaurants.name: Casa Malasia
restaurants.description: Casa Malasia is a asian restaurant located in the city.

restaurants.name: Restaurante Embarcadero (muelle Deportivo)
restaurants.description: Restaurante Embarcadero (muelle Deportivo) is a mediterranean restaurant located in Las Palmas de Gran Canaria.
restaurants.address: Muelle Deportivo, 35008 Las Palmas de Gran Canaria Canarias

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Gran Canaria Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal primarily used for low-cost airlines.

wifi.note: Complimentary wifi is available throughout the airport.
